name: Ass Eater: The Revenge of Ouroboros
name_original: Ass Eater: The Revenge of Ouroboros
description:
A puzzle game about a MORTIS

CONTROLS: WASD/ARROWS to move, Z to undo move, R to reset current level

Made for the Dani's Basement Game Jam.

Made by Gabriel Rush in collaboration with the rats from

the isle of frogs discord server:

godthekid (concept/code)

Jaspisimo(art)

faultyastragal(code)

germy_ranch(eating sounds)

music by Jakob Rush

Thank you to the rat fam over at twitch.tv/spacebrogabe
